title: FREE RENT! Beautiful Single - Hollywood!
posting_body: Advertised rent is net pricing of the unit when factoring in 1/2 of 2nd month free on a 12 month lease.
Actual rent paid to landlord is $2,095/month for studio, and $2,795/month for 2 bedroom.*
Regency Detroit Apartments, located in Hollywood, California near all the world famous attractions.
We have upgraded units and a rooftop sundeck, pool, and spa.
Our breath taking views, nearby shopping and restaurants make this the perfect place to live in the heart of Hollywood.

As a resident at The Regency Detroit Apartments you will be minutes away from the world's finest restaurants, nightlife and shopping such as Dinner at Tao, Beauty & Essex, Katsuya, Gwen and Cleo, Cocktails at The Highlight Room, Mama Shelter, and Avenue, Shows at The Palladium and The Dolby Theatre and shopping at Hollywood and Highland
Pets Policy: Small pets allowed with additional $500 deposit and monthly pet rent ($50/dog & $25/cat)
Our beautifully units, with no detail overlooked, include:
- multiple closets with plenty of additional storage
Please call us for more information and to schedule your personal tour!
*PHOTOS/3D TOUR MAY NOT REPRESENT THE ACTUAL UNIT FOR LEASE.
FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CALL ONSITE MANAGER ABOVE DIRECTLY.
